title: Why do tablets and phones have bezels when they know they can get rid of the bezels and make it full screen? Is there a reason for the bezels? - Quora

response.answer_text: With current technology you will have to have a bezel of some sort because the device needs a frame to protect the components and the edge of the glass is part of that. On tablets you also have bezels because people need to hold the devices and they typical hold them on the edges as tablets are too big to fit in the palm of most peoples hands.
Sharp corners are weak spots that are more easily damaged. Besides, with or without bezels you would still have some framing going on. My TV has no bezel, but it does have a plastic frame.
